      • getVideoWithTags

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<VideoList> getVideoWithTags​(java.lang.String keywords,
                                                                          java.lang.Long maxResults,
                                                                          java.lang.String tagToCheck)
        get videos by the video
        Parameters:
        keywords - to use for the video search.
        maxResults - The maximum number of results to retrieve.
        tagToCheck - The specific tag to check within the video descriptions (optional).
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture that will contain a VideoList of search results.
